tests.name: Report Has Content
tests.run: python -c "import json; results = json.load(open('verification_result.json')); exit(0 if results.get('report_has_content') else 1)"

tests.name: Student Info Provided
tests.run: python -c "import json; results = json.load(open('verification_result.json')); exit(0 if results.get('student_name_filled') and results.get('has_cluster_info') else 1)"

tests.name: Report Format Check
tests.run: test -f installation_report.txt && grep -q 'Successfully Installed Tools' installation_report.txt && grep -q 'Installation Challenges' installation_report.txt
